FuncDef: The pnp start command starts PnP on an AP.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After a master starts, it automatically delivers the pnp start command to an AP to start PnP on the AP. You do not need to manually run the command.
Prerequisites
DCN has been globally enabled using the dcn command.
Precautions
This command is supported only on the admin VS.
When you directly log in to an AP:
If the AP has established a NETCONF channel to a master, the pnp start command cannot be run.If the AP has not established a NETCONF channel to a master, the pnp start command can be run.
